data.title: espera - Translation from Spanish into English
meta_keywords: he/we had a long wait it was a long wait
data.meta_description: Look up the Spanish to English translation of espera in the PONS online dictionary. Includes free vocabulary trainer, verb tables and pronunciation function.
data.text:
How can I copy translations to the vocabulary trainer?

Collect the vocabulary that you want to remember while using the dictionary. The items that you have collected will be displayed under "Vocabulary List".

If you want to copy vocabulary items to the vocabulary trainer, click on "Import" in the vocabulary list.
